name: Battle Support
description:
• shop
You can spend gold coins to open the parts box or spend gold coins to buy supplies

• Armory
Obtaining parts can be used to upgrade troops, and can also upgrade assets and defensive weapons.

• Combat:
The skill box will be dropped during the battle. Players need to manually destroy the skill box. After destroying the skill box, a skill will be randomly selected to assist the player. If the opponent still has troops, you can choose to use the remaining troops for your own use or to reward gold coins after killing. After winning the victory, the player can customize how many troops and supplies to deploy. This function will only trigger other modes in the regional battle.

• AI:
In the setting interface, the player can customize the name and the name of the AI. The AI will randomly attack in a certain direction in the regional battle. The level of the AI unit is random, and the AI ​​is equipped with a random unit.

• How to play:
Area war gameplay One game in the area is divided into 3 small area, and players need to win all the small area to win.
Single player mode There are 3 dots in the middle, whoever steps on the most dots and persists until the end of the game time will win.
Offensive and defensive mode The defensive team needs to defend until the end of the time to win, and the offensive team needs to win 3 areas to win.

• Area war:
There are 2,280 areas in the entire map. Any one of the teams occupying most of the areas will be considered as the strong side, and then the other two teams will be given the option to surrender. If one of the teams does not surrender, they will continue to fight. If they all surrender, the strong side will You can obtain all the troops and materials of the opponent and win the final victory. Players need to occupy all areas to achieve the final victory. Players must not only occupy the area but also consider the strength and materials of each area. If there is a shortage of materials in a certain area, the troops will drop Therefore, the materials must be replenished in time. The deployed troops and materials can be changed at any time. You can also deploy multiple material factories and material warehouses in the area. After the material factories are deployed and produced, the players can choose to allocate them to any area or material warehouse in the material warehouse. There is a lot of storage space to upgrade the factory storage space will also increase accordingly. The material warehouse is used to store materials and cannot be used for supplies. After the final victory, the materials in the material warehouse will be distributed to the players, so players must protect the material warehouse, material factories and materials. Libraries can be moved to any region at any time.

• Challenge tasks:
The system will generate different tasks every time. The tasks have time limit and no time limit. Players only need to complete the task within the specified time to get rich rewards. If they are dissatisfied with the reward or the task, they can skip it at any time.

• Season Pass:
There is no time limit for the pass, and the experience value of the pass is upgraded according to the player's playing time.
There are a lot of rewards in the pass, including new troops.
When the new season is updated, there will be new assets, new units, new maps, etc., and the specific update will notify players through announcements.
